title: Practice Analytics Dashboard
description: Comprehensive business intelligence and performance metrics for legal practice
overview: The Dashboard provides real-time insights into your legal practice performance. Monitor case progress, team productivity, client satisfaction, and financial metrics through interactive charts and customizable widgets designed specifically for legal professionals.
